name: SE2-04 — MIST OF MORNE BLANC
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Morne Blanc (Sans Souci ridge, Mahé). Above the bay, the mist keeps counsel.
Count the five lights that survive the cloud.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: five-point constellation overlays a bearing ring.
properties.clue:
Above the bay, the mist keeps counsel.
Count the five lights that survive the cloud.
properties.visual_description: Cloud forest boards; ridge posts; five faint star points in mist; rope forms a compass arc; pirate shadow in fog.
